name: BRAIN TEST 2
description:
https://jogosonlineapps.com.br/game/brain-test-2

Test your intellect and have a lot of fun! Think outside the box, train your brain. Solve exciting puzzles for adults - prove that you are smarter than everyone! Trust common sense and pay attention to details. Don't try to solve puzzles in the usual way, some puzzles are not as easy as they seem! Enjoy insanely addictive puzzles and puzzles that will make you think outside the box. ? Develop smart creativity. ? Learn to better understand tasks and puzzles. ? Train patience and concentration. ? Train your memory and strategic thinking. ? Solve problems on reflexes. ? Teach the brain to think
